name: Gorilla Stalker 13
description:
* Frequently Asked Questions

- What is Purpose of this game?

This game is madao.

- What are the Controls

W to move Forward

S to move Backward

A & D to move side by side

And you can Wall run also for some reason

This Game is Not Recommended to People With Heart Problems.

This Game is Totally Free For Those who do not Have any Money But if You have money then it will be very good if you pay ^-^
